meanings.definition: Happening or existing at a single point in time.
meanings.sent2: The onetime opportunity to see the comet was missed by many.
meanings.sent3: The onetime magic show left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an onetime burst of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The onetime chance to meet a celebrity made her day.

meanings.sent1: The onetime champion returned to the ring for a special match.
meanings.sent2: The onetime owner of the house left behind a treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent3: The onetime best friends reunited after years apart.
meanings.sent4: His onetime dream of becoming an astronaut seemed closer than ever.
meanings.sent5: The onetime popular restaurant is now a cozy bookstore.
